name: Flappy Fire Dunk
description:
Do you think that only a bird can flap it's wings and fly? Check Our BasketBall for the answer in it's newest adventure in Flappy Fire Dunk!

From Wevi Games, the creators of the many famous apps are taking over now, with one of the best ever created apps, comes Flappy Fire Dunk which raises the bar higher than ever! Use your rhythm to tap the Basketball through her way between the basket! and set your goal to make the ball in FIRE!!
Use various skins for your favorite ball, and watch her crumble in many funny ways!
If You're looking for a challenge, Flappy Fire Dunk Basketball is Your best choice You can make in Wevi's Games series!

Plus Features:
- Play Fire Dunk in the way you never ever will with a ball anymore!
- Get into the basket and set your ball on fire!
- Select from 80 skins your favorite!
- 15 various Ball themes!
- App Store Games support!

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/WeviGames
Official Flappy Fire Dunk fan page: http://www.facebook.com/FlappyFireDunk
